title: Can't load in to game
body: I can join games fine, but when i try to load in to game my screen goes all black and a message comes up with "check cable connection". I have already tried repairing the issue through the repair option on the client, tried reinstalling, tried copying a file from a friends, tried changing the resolution to different setting through game.cfg. please help!

replies.body:
Hi! Sorry for the late response.

Not sure if you're still having this issue but here goes.

The black screen is caused by two things, assets not loading or assets missing. If it was assets missing then a repair would fix the issue, so that means the problem is assets loading. This is essentially a connection issue.

Try following through the steps in this article and see if it help:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
Note: by join games i mean the champ select.
